price: Ati yeye tu ndiye aliye teremshiwa mawaidha peke yake katika sisi? Lakini hao wana shaka na mawaidha yangu, bali hawajaionja adhabu yangu.
arabic: أَءُنزِلَ عَلَيۡهِ ٱلذِّكۡرُ مِنۢ بَيۡنِنَاۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ فِي شَكّٖ مِّن ذِكۡرِيۚ بَل لَّمَّا يَذُوقُواْ عَذَابِ
footnotes: Basi katika sote sisi, amechaguliwa Muhammad tu peke yake kupewa hishima ya kuteremshiwa Qur'ani?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: a-unzila ʿalayhi al-dhik'ru min bayninā bal hum fī shakkin min dhik'rī bal lammā yadhūqū ʿadhābi
